tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Doctor and her staff is very friendly. I would like to recommend her. Doctor is good and experienced.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I visited the clinic for my 9 year old daughter's tooth ache and doctor is very prompt and diagnosed the issue very well. Also explained us clearly the root canal treatment. I am very satisfied with the treatment and post treatment instructions.

Thank you Dr Shagun !!

Had a crown replacement. Dr Shagun did an excellent job and was proactive in making sure that it was completed exactly right. But definitely a scope to keep the place more cleaner.
however, overall good experience , didnt face any issue after that.
thanks to dr.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr Shagun handled the orthodontic corrections for my daughter over the last few months and it was very good experience. She was very helpful and reassuring, always ready to clear the doubts. Would definitely recommend Smile Xpressions multispeciality dental clinic.

best clinic in Harlur

I had my third molar extraction done from Dr Shagun agarwal.This was a life altering moment for me since i am scared of dental treatments.I had a painless extraction done under conscious sedation .Thank you dr Shagun agarwal .
Dr. Shagun was really nice and friendly and explained the details very well. I would only suggest that the clinic location be placed well on the maps. Overall a great place.

***** ********** ** *** **** ****** ****** ** **** i was so afrraid of going to dentist inspite of so many promblems, last  month i got several treatments done by Dr Shagun like 22 Rct, 46 Filling,  also got my teeth cleaned, highly recommend if you are looking for a good dentist in Harlur 

Dr Shagun is very positive, smiling, and eager to help with all questions

Women-owned and run in a highly specialised field - worthy of support.

My experience with the Dr Shagun was just WOW. I went for my crown after my root canal treatment, she explained everything in detail , also my crown was delivered in 2 days, she explained me which one to go for, also gave 15 years warranty for the dental crown. Very happy with the clinic, my friends could not make out the crown, it looks like the natural teeth. Thanks to my doctor.

Very nice experience with the doctor 
Painless tooth removal at clinic 
Waiting time was also less
Value for time seen
Only the reception person behavior was not nice
